category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Word_Show_Display_Name
preference.preference_description: Controls how requirement object names are displayed in the Requirements pane in a Microsoft Word document in the Client for Office application. This preference only applies to the following cases: Exporting Teamcenter requirement structures to live Word using the Export for structure editing and work offline option.Opening and loading Teamcenter requirement structures from the Teamcenter ribbon in Microsoft Word. Valid Values: true - The name of the requirement object is displayed as the DisplayName property configured in the Business Modeler IDE. false - The name of the requirement object is displayed as a combination of the object ID and name.
